Facilities_en:
• A 8-lane 400 m all-weather running track which is up to international standard is provided.
  • A spectator stand with 1,216 seats is provided.
  • A standard 11-a-side natural turf soccer pitch is provided.
  • A male toilet and a female toilet are provided (including accessible toilet).
  • A male changing room with toilet and a female changing room with toilet and a toilet for persons with disabilities are provided.
Facilities_cn:
• 1條符合國際標準的全天候8線400米跑道
  • 可容納1,216名觀眾的看台座位
  • 1個標準11人天然草地足球場
  • 1個男洗手間和1個女洗手間 (設有暢通易達洗手間)
  • 1個男更衣室連洗手間和殘疾人士洗手間，1個女更衣室連洗手間和殘疾人士洗手間
Opening_hours_en:
6:30 am to 6:00 pm daily (November to April of following year)
6:30 am to 6:30 pm daily (May to October)
Opening_hours_cn:
每日上午6時30分至下午6時(11月至翌年4月)

每日上午6時30分至下午6時30分(5月至10月)

Facilities_en:
• A 6-lane 286 m all-weather running track is provided.
  • A turf pitch with lightings is provided.
  • A javelin area, a shot put area, a discus area, a long jump area and a high jump area are provided.
  • Spectator stands with 600 seats are provided.
  • Men's and ladies' changing rooms and toilets
  • Barrier Free Facilities: Accessible Toilet, Tactile Guide Path, Braille Directory Map/Floor Plan
  • A light refreshment kiosk is provided.
Facilities_cn:
• 1條全天候6線跑道(286米)
  • 1個附設照明系統的草地球場
  • 1個標槍區、1個鉛球區、1個鐵餅區、1個跳遠沙池、1個跳高區
  • 可容納600名觀眾的看台座位
  • 男、女更衣室及洗手間
  • 無障礙設施：暢通易達洗手間、觸覺引路帶、觸覺點字及觸覺平面圖
  • 1個小食亭

Facilities_en:
• 1 no. of Natural Grass Football Pitch
  • 8 nos. of Running Track (400 metres)
  • 1 no. of Scoreboard
  • 2 nos. of Spectator Stand with 3,000 seats

  • 1 no. of Light Refreshment Kiosk
  • Men's and ladies' toilets cum changing rooms
  • Barrier Free Facilities: Accessible Toilet, Tactile Guide Path, Braille Directory Map/Floor Plan

  • 1個電子顯示板
  • 2座可容納3000名觀眾的看台

Maintenance_day_en: Every Monday from 12:00 pm to 3:00 pm
Maintenance_day_cn: 逢星期一中午12時至下午3時

Facilities_en:
• 1 IAAF standard eight-lane 400-metre all-weather synthetic running track
  • 1 FIFA standard soccer pitch with floodlights
  • Spectator Stand with capacity of 2500 persons
  • Fee-charging car park with 45 parking spaces (including 1 accessible parking space designated for the use of persons with disability)
  • A Light Refreshment Kiosk

  • 可容納2500人的觀眾席看台

Maintenance_day_en:
The natural turf pitch is closed for maintenance on every Wednesday, other facilities and services are not affected.
Every 2nd and 4th Wednesday from 11am to 4pm is closed for maintenance.
Maintenance_day_cn:
逢星期三為天然草地球場保養日，草地球場暫停開放，其餘設施及服務則不受影響。
每月第二及第四個星期三為場地保養日，早上11時至下午4時暫停開放。

Maintenance_day_en:
The natural turf pitch is closed for maintenance on every Wednesday, other facilities and services are not affected.
Every 1st and 3rd Thursday from 9am to 1pm is closed for maintenance.
Maintenance_day_cn:
逢星期三為天然草地球場保養日，草地球場暫停開放，其餘設施及服務則不受影響。
每月第一及第三個星期四為場地保養日，早上9時至下午1時暫停開放。

Facilities_en:
• 1 International Standard Running Track with 6 nos. of lane; 110M Synthetic Surface Running Track
  • 1 Jogging Track with 1 nos. of lane; 350M Synthetic Surface Jogging Track
  • 1 International Standard Natural Grass Pitch with lighting facility
  • 1 First Aid Room
  • 1 Covered Spectator Stand (1000 Concrete Seats )
  • A carpark with 5 parking spaces for private car / van-type light goods vehicle (including 1 designated disabled parking space)
  • Male and Female Changing Room & Toilet
  • Barrier Free Facilities: Accessible Toilet, Accessible Lift, Tactile Guide Path, Visual Fire Alarm System, Braille Directory Map/Floor Plan
  • Lockers are provided in Changing Room and out of Office.
  • Drinking Fountain

Facilities_en:
• An eight-lane 400-metre all-weather athletic track of international standard
  • Standard field facilities for high jump, long jump, triple jump, javelin and throwing events.
  • A turf pitch of international standard with a floodlight system
  • A full colour electronic scoreboard 
  • A covered spectator stand with a seating capacity of 11 981
  • Fast food and light refreshment kiosks
  • A warm-up track
  • A fee-paying car park with 70 parking spaces (including 53 for private cars, 5 for coaches, 10 for motorcycles and 2 for accessible parking space)
  • Ancillary facilities: changing rooms and toilets for males, females, lockers (no padlock is provided), a conference room, etc.
  • Barrier Free Facilities: Accessible Toilet, Accessible Lift (with Assistive Listening System), Tactile Guide Path, Visual Fire Alarm System, Braille Directory Map/Floor Plan.
  • A babycare room
Facilities_cn:
• 符合國際標準的全天候八線400米跑道
  • 田徑項目的標準設施：跳高、跳遠、三級跳、標槍、擲項運動
  • 符合國際標準的草地球場，並附設照明系統
  • 彩色顯示電子計分屏幕
  • 有蓋可容納11,981名觀眾的看台
  • 快餐及小食售賣亭
  • 熱身徑
  • 設有70個泊車位的收費停車場(包括53個私家車車位、5個旅遊巴士車位、10個電單車車位及2個暢通易達停車位)
  • 配套設施：男、女更衣室和洗手間、貯物櫃(需自備掛鎖)、會議室等
  • 無障礙設施：暢通易達洗手間、暢通易達升降機 (設有廣播裝置)、觸覺引路帶、視像火警警報、觸覺點字及觸覺平面圖
  • 1個育嬰間
Maintenance_day_cn: 逢星期一上午8時至下午5時

Facilities_en:
• 1 all-weather running track with 250m (5 lanes)
  • 1 7-a-side cum 5-a-side soccer pitch
  • 1 shot put ring
  • 2 sand pitch of long jump
  • 1 set of equipment for high jump
  • Spectator stand with 500 seats
  • 1 basketball court
  • Children playground
  • Men’s and ladies’ changing rooms and toilets

Facilities_cn:
• 1 條250米長全天候跑道(5線)

Facilities_en:
Major facilities:
  • A 100m 5-lane all-weather athletic track
  • A 400m 1-lane jogging track
  • A throw rink for shot put, javelin and discus
  • A jumping area for long jump, triple jump and high jump
  • A 95m x 64m grass pitch for booking by organisations and schools for track and field activities, football and rugby
  • 6 tennis courts
  • 2 tennis practice courts
Other facilities:
  • Changing room cum lavatory
  • 3 sets of portable spectator stands with seating capacity for 72 persons.
  • Barrier Free Facilities: Accessible Toilet, Tactile Guide Path
Facilities_cn:
主要設施：
  • 1組100米5線全天候人造跑道
  • 1條400米1線全天候人造緩步徑
  • 1個投擲區(可進行投擲鉛球、標槍、鐵餅)
  • 1個跳遠及跳高區(可進行三級跳遠)
  • 1個草地球場(95米x 64米)，只供團體及學校租用，以進行田徑、足球或欖球活動
  • 6個網球場
  • 2個網球練習場
輔助設施：
  • 更衣室連洗手間
  • 3個3層高鋁合金看台，可容納72人
  • 無障礙設施：暢通易達洗手間、觸覺引路帶
Maintenance_day_en: The grass pitch is closed for maintenance every Thursday. Other facilities and services at booking counter are not affected.
Maintenance_day_cn: 逢星期四為草地球場保養日，草地球場暫停開放，其餘設施及訂場服務則不受影響

Facilities_en:
• A 400m 8-lane all-weather athletic track
  • A 40m 4-lane warm-up track
  • A 210m 2-lane warm-up track with one end connected to the 40m 4-lane warm-up track
  • Shot put, discus, javelin and hammer throw rinks
  • 1 high jump and pole vault area
  • 2 long jump and triple jump runways with 2 landing pits
  • Refreshment kiosk
  • 2 spectator stands with 2 401 seats provided, including 69 VIP seats and 4 seats for persons with disabilities
  • 2 men's toilets & 1 changing room cum lavatory
  • 1 ladies' toilet & 1 changing room cum lavatory
  • 1 record keeping room
  • 1 first aid room
  • 1 sports equipment room
  • 1 fitness room
  • 1 weight lifting room
  • Electronic timing equipment, scoreboard and video-finishing system
  • Barrier Free Facilities: Accessible Toilet, Tactile Guide Path
Facilities_cn:
• 1組8線400米全天候跑道
  • 1組4線40米熱身跑道
  • 1組2線210米熱身跑道，末端連接40米熱身跑道
  • 備有投擲區(可進行投擲鉛球、標槍、鐵餅及鏈球)
  • 1個跳高區、橕杆跳高區
  • 2條跳遠和三級跳跑道及2個沙池
  • 小食亭
  • 設有兩個看台，共提供2401個座位，當中包括一個設有69座位的嘉賓席及4個傷健人士座位
  • 2間男洗手間；1間男更衣室連洗手間
  • 1間女洗手間；1間女更衣室連洗手間
  • 1間記錄室
  • 1間救護室
  • 1間器材室
  • 1間健身室
  • 1間舉重室
  • 1套電子計時器、電子計分顯示屏及終點拍攝儀器
  • 無障礙設施：暢通易達洗手間、觸覺引路帶

Facilities_en:
• An international standard 400-metres running track (8 lanes).
  • An international standard natural turf pitch for ball games with floodlight system.
  • A spectator stand with capacity of 1450 persons.
  • Toilets and changing rooms with lockers are provided.
  • Barrier Free Facilities: Accessible Toilet, Tactile Guide Path, Braille Directory Map/Floor Plan
  • A fee-paying carpark with 30 parking spaces for private car / van-type light goods vehicle and 5 parking spaces for motorcycle. (including 1 designated disabled parking space)
  • A Fast Food Kiosk.
  • Electronic timing equipment
Facilities_cn:
• 1條符合國際標準的全天候8線400米跑道
  • 1個符合國際標準的草地球場並附設照明系統
  • 可容納1,450名觀眾的看台座位
  • 設有洗手間、更衣室及貯物櫃
  • 無障礙設施：暢通易達洗手間、觸覺引路帶、觸覺點字及觸覺平面圖
  • 1個可容納30輛汽車及5輛電單車停泊的時租停車場 (設有1個殘疾人士專用車位)
  • 1間快餐售賣亭
  • 電子計時儀器

Facilities_en:
Main sports ground
  • 1 IAAF standard eight-lane 400-metre all-weather running track
  • 1 high jump take-off runway with landing area
  • 1 pole-vault runway with landing area
  • 2 javelin-throw circles
  • 2 long jump and triple jump runways with 4 landing pits
  • 1 hammer and discus cage
  • 2 shot-put throwing areas
  • 1 set of steeple chase facilities
  • Electronic timing system and electronic scoreboard
  • 1 fixed spectator stand with 3,500 seats
  • 1 FIFA standard 11-a-side soccer pitch with floodlights

    Secondary sports ground
  • 1 IAAF standard four-lane 300-metre all-weather synthetic running track with a 120-metre straight track
  • 1 high jump take-off runway with landing area
  • 1 pole-vault runway and landing area
  • 1 javelin-throw circle
  • 1 long jump and triple jump runway with 2 landing pits
  • 1 hammer and discus cage
  • 2 shot-put throwing areas
  • 1 7-a-side-soccer pitch with floodlights
Facilities_cn:
主運動場
  • 1條符合國際田徑聯會標準的400米8線全天候跑道
  • 1條跳高起跳跑道連落地區
  • 1條撐竿跳跑道連落地區
  • 2個標槍投擲圈
  • 2條跳遠和三級跳跑道及4個沙池
  • 1個鏈球和鐵餅護籠
  • 2個鉛球投擲區
  • 1套障礙賽設備
  • 電子計時系統及電子計分顯示屏
  • 1個設有3500個座位的固定看台
  • 1個符合國際足協標準並附設泛光燈照明系統的11人草地足球場

    副運動場
  • 1條符合國際田徑聯會標準的300米4線全天候跑道，其中120米為直線跑道
  • 1條跳高起跳跑道連落地區
  • 1條撐竿跳跑道連落地區
  • 1個標槍投擲圈
  • 1條跳遠和三級跳跑道及2個沙池
  • 1個鏈球和鐵餅護籠
  • 2個鉛球投擲區
  • 1個附設泛光燈照明系統的7人草地足球場
Maintenance_day_en:
Main sports ground – every Monday
Secondary sports ground – every Friday
Maintenance_day_cn:
主場 – 逢星期一
副場 – 逢星期五
